A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just signed up so I can say not to see Star Wars. Wait for red box release cause it's all it's really paying to see. I bought  tickets when they went on sale took off from work. When I walked out of theater I felt so empty. First star wars movie ever I truly hated.  The only emotion I have for this movie.  Whoever wrote this movie never saw a movie\, talked to a fan\,  and doesn't care about staying true to the genre.  My heart is broken.
